titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the reliefe of His Majesties army, and good subjects in Ireland, with corne and other victuall
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, the 28 day of February, in the nineteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
